author: Darren Reeves
comment: We have a Jeep that is lifted with huge tires that has caused the odo to be off. I was using my smart phone to see the speed usually when a police car was behind us. Now, Using this face on my Moto is just a flick of the wrist to make sure we are in compliance. This face has saved our butts a ticket! Thanks :)
title: Works great for a lifted OlllllO!

author: V B
comment: very nice design but speed doesn't work with Urbane 2nd Edition. It is weird that the speed app is not linked to the watch face. I see interactive faces with other watch faces. I would replace the number "6" with something fun like 99 so it is obvious it is not live ... well maybe for you slow pokes out there ;) Here is an idea. It would be cool that if it was designed that if you touch the speed area it would activate the speed and keep the screen live until it is touched again
title: nice design but should have speed shortcut

author: Jeff Jonez
comment: A great if cluttered face. If you like exactly what you see, go for it. Want any customization? Want to turn some stuff off? 2 bux please. Integration with a phone-based speedometer is a cool idea, though. Kudos to the author!

author: Hassan Alam
comment: Nice watch face. But being a speedometer app,  it lacks a very crucial feature. There is no option to change the speed units from mph to km/h

author: Mike Hager
comment: Beautiful, but it crashes a lot for me. The speedometer is for show only, the functionality is activates with purchase of the full version. I would give it 5 stars if it didn't crash.

author: Jon Salisbury
comment: Not that bothered by the speedo. I just like the watch face. Smart and sophisticated. When in standby mode it still looks similar and nice instead if changing the look completely to something basic and ugly!
title: Great face even in standby

author: Frederik MHz
comment: I can't get out to show km/h only mph.... No good for the rest of the world....
title: It works but no way of changing speed value

author: Pablo Sama
comment: It looks good but the speedometer didn't work for me until I bought the pro version which I find redundant for a trial app.
title: It LOOKS good

author: M Robin
comment: Great watch face. So many to try out and not enough time, but have come back to this one every time. Lot of thought put into it to make a lot of info available on main screen! I like the battery bar going to red when getting low to get my attention to top off the charge, one of the few that does that. Keep up the great work!
title: Speeds Face

author: Peter Midgley
comment: Always come back to this face.   Nothing looks anything close to as good on my LG.
title: Still my fave

author: Larry Bawcom
comment: Works great!!! Speed dial stopped working in truck, been using app on phone, but this on my wrist is much better! Highly recommend. Later, Larry.                                   (ps- that smooth moving second hand is, well, SMOOTH!)
title: Speed on my wrist

author: Ross Stewart
comment: Won't let me personalise anything and no matter what I try the speedo won't work.
title: Basic and glitchy

author: Russell Hill
comment: Killed my phone battery in no time, uninstalled it.
title: Unbelievable battery drain

author: Amar-Singh HSS
comment: Looks great on the Moto, but app makers need to stop the repeated request for a review, even after its been done.

author: Not Sure
comment: I also think it would be nice to be able to loose the speedometer when it's not engaged. Either way I like it. But if you could option for the speedometer to disappear it would look more sophisticated witch could be quite nice.
It is a bad clock. When I installed it it didn't can on my apps! Hhmmmmm! Its solo bad plz don't install it for god sake

author: steven claggion jr
comment: I have been using the free version and it is by far the best screen I have used it gives me all the info I need and still keep my look
title: Long Time user timeless preformce

author: David
comment: Honestly the only thing I like about this watch face is that shows me how much battery is left on my phone

author: Frederik Born
comment: I mean an option that also shows the blackish grey background and the seconds hand(of course it would be frozen)
title: Please add full ambient mode

author: Dave Harper
comment: my gear live has never looked so good. great work developer!
title: love this app

author: Philip Lalruatsanga
comment: Dont care bout the speedometer... wish it was not there, otherwise best watchface i have come across
title: Nice watch

author: JUAN EL TITAN
comment: Great looking face but the speedometer doesn't work.
title: Good and bad...

author: Abayomi Gibbs
comment: This is a great looking chronograph that WORKS, looks at home on a square faced watch. I really like it.
title: Backs up the looks

author: Matt Stephan
comment: Should work on all android devices!
title: Doesn't work on sony sw2

author: Kevin Frayne
comment: My one and only face for the first couple months... Because nothing else has looked better.
title: Beautiful

author: Juan Emilio Canales
comment: Very clear view at watch face, useful features, elegant-looking,  I am really yazzed with it.  Try it yourself.   Highly recommended
title: Speeds Wear Watch App

author: HideM YName
comment: It doesn't work, then it nags you.
title: Nag screen is annoying

author: yugh ms
comment: Could someone help me. I just don't know how to use it on my Sony SmartWatch 2.if someone would know pls reply

author: Basel Jabri
comment: It has every thing I need in Watch.
this like app dog cat and etc
title: very bad app

author: Mark Koopmans
comment: Would give it a 5 star except it murders your battery.
title: Use this face the most

author: Chris Weatherby
comment: Clear face, gives new personality to watch. Like seeing charge level clearly. Have yet to try speed fldial
title: Good

author: Jason Dolan
comment: When I tap the screen i get no menu for speedometer. Nothing happens on  Huawei W1 android wear watch.
title: Speed not working on Huawei W1

author: Neil Downing
comment: Although I can't get the speed to work
title: Good Watch face

author: Pierre Roc
comment: Its OK the speedo don't work.

author: Miguel Rosales
comment: Una de las mejores caratulas para moto 360
title: Very nice

author: Andy Phillips
comment: Good app. Speed is fairly accurate. Appears to use alot of battery

author: Richard Seymour
comment: After I download it I cant find it
title: Cant get it to work

author: Tan Iwin
comment: Awesome watch face. For now, doesn't make me wanna change it to any other watch face
title: Love it

author: Seth Haskins
comment: Downloaded on my turbo2 for my Moto 360, cannot use on my watch. It's not in the watch face menu.
